implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: This function fetches user data from the JSONPlaceholder API, processes it, and writes it to a CSV file. It is the entry point for the data retrieval and storage logic.
implementation.name: main()
implementation.pseudo_code:
async function main():
    fetch user data from JSONPlaceholder API
    IF fetch fails
        throw error
    ELSE
        parse response as JSON
        create CSV headers
        FOR each user in users
            convert user to CSV row
        join rows into CSV string
        create data directory if not exists
        write CSV string to file
        log success

    IF CSV file does not exist
        respond with 404 and error message
    ELSE
        read CSV file
        convert CSV to JSON
        respond with JSON data

    ELSE

        FOR each line

        return array of user objects
